name: 和聲學（二）
comment: 需依照分班考結果選課
description: 對於西洋調性音樂之和聲能深入了解，且能於習作中確實掌握並靈活運用各類和弦以求得最佳之音響色彩。
goals: 正確和聲觀念的再加強
將所學理論實際用於音樂創作之中的練習
syllabus:
Week 1     Secondary function 1 (SATB writing exercise)

Week 2     Secondary function 2 (SATB writing exercise)

Week 5   Some other modulatory techniques

Week 6   Score analysis

Week 7   Score analysis

      Functions and modulation skills

Week 9   Binary and ternary forms

Week 12   Augmented sixth chord (SATB writing exercise)

Week 14   Score analysis
